author: sabpol
title: Great for building houses
review:
This set has a large amount of roof shingles, red and black, mostly 2 studs wide and and a few 3 studs wide; lots of windows and shutters; 2 doors; yellow fence pieces; and many 1, 2, 4, and 6 stud bricks - making this set great for building houses.  The blue windmill rotates 360 degrees on a turning plate.  

I rated this in the context of 1975, when present-day minifigs had not yet been invented.  The stiff figs with no faces make this set a little less fun than it would be with today's movable minifigs, but it's still a fantastic set that I spent countless hours playing with over 26 years ago.  My brother and I played with this set until we wore the studs off of some of the pieces; hence, the wheel bricks won't attach to the underside of the car anymore.
